skills.name: STUNNING TOUCH
desc: • Deal random damage to a single enemy that increases based on your MAX HP.
• If the enemy is suffering from Crave effects, including Silver and Innate effects, inflict Perfect Stun for 2 turns on a random enemy.
• Grant HP Regen to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: ETERNAL CRAVING
desc: • Deal random damage to a single enemy that increases based on your MAX HP.
• If the enemy is suffering from Stun effects, including Silver and Innate effects, inflict Perfect Crave for 2 turns on a random enemy.
• Revive a random ally to FULL HP.

skills.name: QUARANTINED
desc: At the start of battle and at the start of your turn, inflict Perfect Corruption, Perfect Crave or Perfect Stun for 2 turns on a random enemy. Gain either Physical, Magic, or True Damage Invulnerability at the start of battle for the duration of battle.
